metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14315 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A memory corruption vulnerability is present in bspatch as shipped in Colin Percivalâ€™s bsdiff tools version 4.3. Insufficient checks when handling external inputs allows an attacker to bypass the sanity checks in place and write out of a dynamically allocated buffer boundaries.

criterions.comment: bsdiff package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
